comment: Our GR is very supportive and always helps the group stay organized.
GR communicates clearly and makes sure everyone understands their role.
They manage deadlines very well and keep the group on track.
GR listens to everyoneâ€™s opinion before making a decision.

GR occasionally delays updates, which creates confusion.
